title: Notes without a Category Yet
summary: Buddhist practice notes and teachings - notes-and-contemplations

thoughts.content:
# Notes without a Category Yet

- ***Sangha*** (संघ) is a [Sanskrit](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sanskrit)[[3]](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sangha#cite_note-3)[[4]](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sangha#cite_note-4)[[5]](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sangha#cite_note-5) word used in many Indian languages, including [Pali](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pali) (सङ्घ, saṃgha/saṅgha)[[6]](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sangha#cite_note-6) meaning "association", "assembly", "company" or "community"
- *The three gems*

> *I take refuge in the Buddha. I take refuge in the dharma. I take refuge in the sangha*
>
